articles.description: Reaction to Champions League defeats for Manchester United and Arsenal, while Burnley earn their first Premier League win of the season.
articles.title: Champions League reaction - bad night for Arsenal & Man Utd

articles.description: The UK and Republic of Ireland are now the only bidders for Euro 2028 after Turkey withdraws to focus on a joint bid with Italy for Euro 2032.
articles.title: UK & Ireland now sole bidder for Euro 2028

articles.description: Britain's Mark Cavendish announces he will delay plans to retire in order to race in next year's Tour de France.
articles.title: Cavendish to race next year to target Tour record

articles.description: Why the stats suggest England's World Cup defence might not be as straightforward as Jos Buttler's side might hope.
articles.title: How ODI cricket and England have changed since 2019

articles.description: Get in the mood for the 2023 men's Cricket World Cup by reliving the closing stages of the 2019 final.
articles.title: How England won incredible World Cup final

articles.description: Chicago Fire offer a future discount to supporters at Wednesday's MSL match against Inter Miami, whose star player Lionel Messi could miss out.
articles.title: Chicago offer fans $250 incentive amid Messi doubt

articles.description: Nominations for the BBC Sports Personality of the Year Unsung Hero award are now open.
articles.title: Unsung Hero 2023 - make your nomination

articles.description: Speaking to BBC Breakfast, former England and Newcastle United striker Alan Shearer says the audio recording released by referees' body PGMOL is "chaotic".
articles.title: VAR recording 'chaotic' - Shearer

articles.description: After another terrible start to the season, can Erik ten Hag be the Manchester United boss to finally buck the trend?
articles.title: 'The more things change at Man Utd, the more they stay the same'

articles.description: Wales will be without captain Aaron Ramsey for their key Euro 2024 qualifier against Croatia on 15 October because of a knee injury.
articles.title: Injured Ramsey out of Wales squad to face Croatia
